# The Ethereum Fetcher - REST Server

## Building the server

      make build

## Starting the server

      make run

## Testing `/lime/eth/:rlphex`

      curl -X GET http://127.0.0.1:

## Requesting all transactions `/lime/all`

      curl http://localhost:8080/lime/all

## Authenticating `/lime/authenticate`

      curl -X POST localhost:8080/lime/authenticate -d '{"username":"alice", "password":"alice"}'

## Fetching transactions for authenticated users `/lime/eth/:rlphex`

      	curl -X GET http://127.0.0.1: -H 'AUTH_TOKEN:$(AUTH_TOKEN)'

## Fetching transaction history for authenticated users `/lime/my`

        curl -X GET http://127.0.0.1:8080/lime/my -H 'AUTH_TOKEN:$(AUTH_TOKEN)'
